Package camp_system.camp

Class Camp

Object
CampInformation
Camp
public class Camp extends CampInformation
Represent a camp that is available to students

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Camp

      public Camp(long id, String name, Faculty group, String location, String description, Date startDate, Date endDate, Date registerBy, int totalSlots, int committeeSlots, String staffInCharge)
      Creates a new Camp object with the relevant information
      Parameters:
      name - This is the camp's name
      group - This is the group the camp is open to
      location - This is where the camp will be held
      description - This is the description of the camp
      startDate - This is when the camp starts
      endDate - This is the when the camp ends
      registerBy - This is when students must register for the camp
      totalSlots - This is the total number of slots available for the camp (both committee and attendees)
      committeeSlots - This is the number of slots available for committee members
      staffInCharge - This is the staff that is in charge of the entire camp

    • Camp

      public Camp(long id, Boolean active, String name, Faculty group, String location, String description, Date startDate, Date endDate, Date registerBy, int totalSlots, int committeeSlots, String staffInCharge, ArrayList<String> committeeList, ArrayList<String> attendeeList, ArrayList<String> withdrawedList)
      Creates a new Camp object with the relevant information
      Parameters:
      id - This is the unique ID of the camp
      active - This is the visibility of the camp
      name - This is the name of the camp
      group - This is the group the camp is open to
      location - This is where the camp will be held
      description - This is the description of the camp
      startDate - This is when the camp starts
      endDate - This is the when the camp ends
      registerBy - This is when students must register for the camp
      totalSlots - This is the total number of slots available for the camp (both committee and attendees)
      committeeSlots - This is the number of slots available for committee members
      staffInCharge - This is the staff that is in charge of the entire camp
      committeeList - This is the initial list of committee members
      attendeeList - This is the initial list of attendees
      withdrawedList - This is the initial list of students that withdrawed from the camp
